item.title: Tarantula's First Scripts!
item.dc:creator: @Tarantula Tarantula
item.description:
@Tarantula wrote:

My most stupid, boring, brainless and first scripts ;D

Here you go :rolleyes: (dont even try)

program New; begin writeln ('moparisthebest') end.

Oh my god! Im so 1337! I just made my mouse move to point (10, 20)!!! :))

program New; begin begin; writeln ('moparisthebest') end; begin; MoveMouse (10, 20) end; end.

Woaaaaah! I just made script what finds bitmap and move mouse to it! Im soo proud now ;D (it works for everyone)

[code]program FindingBitmap;

var
bitmap, x, y : Integer;

begin

Bitmap := BitmapFromString(12, 12, ‘z78DA85935B9284300845B7’ +
‘948447E01342DCFF92063A6D555BF3F283420CE75E50F7DA1AB23’ +
‘FE27445A33B0A5A3C2B15F7B7AEEF04598B2D04832B8FADC8B036’ +
‘0D5027341CBA827FA3BDB560B1E0F4D80C1657261ED715598B4D0’ +
‘6DD09B43559D76C22B81EB493A34DF048C5803E21B854F73472BA’ +
‘322AEE193CD24F70719C3222F4A1D3C9DE8441D973384D34DDA02’ +
‘DEEAD6681CE9EB83CBBF675F566745DC5612F4ECB8B7DE8898770’ +
‘68ADD5645D2C6F46B7F49679A407D175087B1E2775B2B554731C4’ +
‘3D9199E9C52CE337EFC97A6E26B27B98DAAA7E7248CDE243DC983’ +
‘F0E0E0B0B8697CBABCFCBF7AAB9E3434A7D11926402713ACDE096’ +
‘7DB87D61B8DEA0535BA990C35055AED24EBB9C37A0A4A76D46FC2’ +
‘677CD3A474BB24277569C8AA3C3D68A9809E378043F0EFAF311D7’ +
‘B29F26BDEECE23BD6ECEC13FE23FCF477D47FC1C0707F1BBF9DFF’ +
‘02A7B9C505’);

    FindBitmap (bitmap, x, y);
    MoveMouse (x,y);

end.[/code]

Heres my first script for RS2! Its called AutoLogin! (I Made it completely myself! :eek:)

AutoLoginByTarantula:

[code]///////////////////////////////////////////////
//This Script is completely made by Tarantula//
///////////////////////////////////////////////
// To set your username, edit line 51 //
// To set your password, edit line 68 //
///////////////////////////////////////////////

Program AutoLoginByTarantula;

var
ExistingUser, Login, Username, Password, x, y : Integer;

begin;

ExistingUser := BitmapFromString(52, 11, ‘z78DAAD56C1AEC320’ +
‘0CFBA56A49FBB663A7ADFFFF494FEA3818199B4C1D87A88200897’ +
‘19C1EC77CC43B8E7CE42D33DF6CFD2A7BC61ECFCCF60D36EFB9AF’ +
‘99AF3CD6BD7DD7ADBA05EFC2992DEEB9342BE2F179213E8B1D9C7’ +
‘53B87F3F5B815A2521176AB845BE57D3BC4CA31F0398C9B7F4D69’ +
‘CBFE5FB0F73C6D1021DEC82F82BCAA58FB8E039E08BE71E483931’ +
‘92564DD693B9EC07CA5D67046BEACC8A2C3E41611CF660981CEE7’ +
‘FC9ED43B58A5699FD8D66DFDDBE2637995F9C0EF8595AED050B77’ +
‘B4FCEB153159B5D8730AA9CDD85987B7D43DC98456AEF409704CE’ +
‘5E512B11B2DAA8ECF00446CFDFC5FE523DA05E1037466FD03BBC7’ +
‘25AFCB97E2711AA5A2EE3E0FD154A15F5A8F0ED8B8E032AA77299’ +
‘E056C1D6627E7D7EE0C9EA2DBA9BC77CD207AFE47E79EF6FF9E66’ +
‘BA7C279CF379E9FE8A44086197E1DB74A5F60762D85C1958579B1’ +
‘9E0FFAA998571D8179253D6DEFAEF8F35FBDD7C37F3F97112D’);

   FindBitmap (ExistingUser, x, y);
   MoveMouseSmooth (x, y);
   ClickMouse (x, y, true);

   Wait (1000+random(200));
   
   //Pressing "Username"//

     Username := BitmapFromString(37, 6, 'z78DABD94C10E802008865' +
   'FA9E267CBA3A5BEFF23B585071BC1B45A1C38B81FE103B414CF30' +
   '8390B4B7F494A820B41E2B2253E9308AB481AA975837975F95DCA' +
   '0A3A6D3AC7BB4D2D42B2EADFC2C57E32DA57F2ED5F6CCA2D58FD2' +
   'F9B11675CF8E55E58ECCA1FF7CB4C26774560F2D3ABD99A2E485C' +
   '17980DAEAF31B3AB793172ED9A88F66F7D3664A2E55C9CDDFD2D0' +
   'E9F77800E5923FFE');
   
   FindBitmap (Username, x, y);
   MoveMouseSmooth (x, y);
   ClickMouse (x, y, true);
   Wait (300+random(300));
   SendKeys ('Username');
   
   Wait (500+random(100));
   
   //Pressing "password"//
     Password := BitmapFromString(33, 6, 'z78DACD52410AC03008FBD' +
   '28616D663B7CEFF3F6950855924D2DDE621070D6A34226FF0C1AD' +
   '10EF4CDC15C5575D3E5623933A095745C4F41C6A74322922FE362' +
   '2EFA91CD3321055635E03A946B3AC2760C69EA642F50E2D88633B' +
   '5C7C97BAAE02E6C16ED3FECB97F1BF50CC5D013F85D47D559DFA3' +
   '3BFC08AB7E305FEAFC24F9F7E9DE6E3CED033A903232EF921A87B' +
   '00DE4E1B24');
   
   FindBitmap (Password, x, y);
   MoveMouseSmooth (x, y);
   ClickMouse (x, y, true);
   Wait (300+random(300));
   SendKeys ('password');

   Wait (1000+random(200));


   //Pressing login button//

Login := BitmapFromString(34, 14, ‘z78DAAD96510A03310844AFB’ +
‘434B6B49FBBB4B9FF910A6BA013CC4B0DAD1F4310571DA3716BFD’ +
‘88DD6DBFDA002F66F6722CAF52ED51F67298358C9A5BB9DBD6506’ +
‘D02AA67C2817F40A152B7539A9FC0651EBD455416E96CA39FCEA7’ +
‘72899A3C17F299C7E92DA8CDA0321411EE7DC025F4D520BAE3A59’ +
‘472340C597536E779DE399A0972F1FC35AEF400DE0BC4AD203441’ +
‘5FECC3046D221EBD4EA531022E8339856E7419D4336F2F7D42958’ +
‘9F90FFCCCE7252059FEAEA74CBCE6999A90865E66B25CD0AF72A4’ +
‘CE018E292E94C39FB8ACDE0B71AC09D1D9219B6E66A102F4954FC’ +
‘DC2BD80BDC7DD12A2378536306BF33ED7D79BBCA95EDFF9CEFE69’ +
‘F5BAB73CFDAC9A0C2E6E767C39E3EE887B447756D074F913A6F3A’ +
‘76E9CBFD5F8DF459B31EE7DDFC599CC135C68F765E60BF3A7BFD3’ +
‘687F9EDF86E38A58’);

   FindBitmap (Login, x, y);
   MoveMouseSmooth (x, y);
   ClickMouse (x, y, true);

end.[/code]

Ohhh, more scripts coming! ;D

Heres script for game called “Spank The Monkey”

[code]///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// This script is 100% made by Tarantula //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// 1. Go to http://www.ebaumsworld.com/spankmonkey.shtml //
// 2. Drag the crosshair to Spank The Monkey client. //
// 3. Run script. //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program SpankTheMonkeyByTarantula;

var
x, y :integer;

begin
HoldMouse (530, 245, true);
MoveMouse (0, 245);
ReleaseMouse (x, y, true);
end.[/code]

Heres script for game called “Wak The Sak”

[code]///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// This script is 100% made by Tarantula //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// 1. Go to http://www.ebaumsworld.com/wakthesak.html //
// 2. Drag the crosshair to Wak The Sak client. //
// 3. Press play and run script. //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program WakTheSakByTarantula;

var
x, y :integer;

begin
HoldMouse (500, 180, true);
MoveMouse (0, 180);
ReleaseMouse (x, y, true);
end.[/code]

More scripts coming soon! (i hope ;))

Read full topic
